explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), which are a subset of machine learning techniques.
explanations.neural network: The paper focuses on Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), a type of neural network designed for graph-structured data.
explanations.deep learning: GNNs are a part of deep learning, as they involve multiple layers to learn representations of graph data.
explanations.representation learning: The paper mentions that MOE integrates both local and global information into each explanation, which involves learning representations of the data.
